long_description: Try to protect yourself from the falling anvils! But be careful: The anvils can also appear in caves, in the end and in the nether! Try to avoid them wisely. But the challenge also has an advantage: Use the anvils to upgrade your tools and armor with enchanted books!
name: mcl_falling_anvils
title: Mineclone2 Falling Anvils
